name: Colorful Game Of Life (Conway's Game Of Life) / (Modern Art Generator)
name_original: Colorful Game Of Life (Conway's Game Of Life) / (Modern Art Generator)
description:
Just because I was bored I want to make my own game of life.

It doesn't make any sense and there is no goal but here it is

Click a square to change it's color. It's that simple

BTW you can create modern art in it.
